lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
Just when things have really begun to take off with you and ${loverName}, an old girl friend calls up, and begs to speak with you, or see you "just one more time."
Your Trustworthy characteristic shows that you can have an intelligent conversation with your "ex" and still maintain your loyalty to ${loverName}.
Your Trustworthy characteristic shows that you might have some conflicts regarding your loyalty to ${loverName}.
Your level of impulsiveness suggests that you would not be able to resist the advances she makes. The old flame is rekindled. You can:
#GIVE IN TO THE ADVANCES MADE BY YOUR OLD GIRL FRIEND
${loverName} eventually finds out and asks you to make a choice. Who would you rather be with?

After three weeks, everything that caused the two of you problems the first time, causes even more headaches this time around. Have you forgotten that the two of you really can't stand one another? Don't even think about going back
She takes you back, but never completely trusts you again.

Your level of impulsiveness suggests that you have the self-control necessary to resist her. Your old girlfriend comes on to you strongly, promising that if the two of you ever got back together, things would be totally different.

Why tempt yourself with something that is certain to open up a closet full of old skeletons?  You have made a healthy separation and no longer wish to be involved with your "ex." Seeing her would only reinforce the fact that you still need each other, in
which case she might never stop calling on you for help, favors, etc.
